data.comment: The match has started at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Shonan.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Shonan to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Minoru Tojo signals a Shonan throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Goal! Takuya Okamoto gives Shonan a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 4, Great play from Akimi Barada to set up the goal.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Kashiwa's Masatoshi Mihara gets in a shot on goal at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Kashiwa at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Kashiwa's area.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Kashiwa's Michael Olunga has run offside.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 12, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Cristiano is booked for the away team.
Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Shonan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Tarik Elyounoussi (Shonan) strikes at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka but his header is cleared.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa push forward at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka and Tatsuya Yamashita gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shonan defence.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Goal! Kashiwa draw level to 1-1 through a Michael Olunga header.
Cristiano instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 27, Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
In the minute 29, Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 30, Shonan drive upfield and Naoki Ishihara gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Minoru Tojo signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Shonan's half.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Free kick Shonan.
In the minute 33, Masatoshi Mihara (Kashiwa) has received a first yellow card.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Shonan in the half of Kashiwa.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Kanagawa.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 39, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa just outside Shonan's area.
At Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka, Koki Tachi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 42, Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kashiwa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Kashiwa's Michael Olunga goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Minoru Tojo will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Yuta Kamiya is replacing Masatoshi Mihara for Kashiwa at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
In the minute 50, Yuta Kamiya gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashiwa.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Free kick Shonan.
Tatsuya Yamashita (Kashiwa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yuta Kamiya is on target to give Kashiwa a 1-2 advantage.
In the minute 54, That's a fine assist from Ataru Esaka.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Shonan have an attacking throw-in.
Minoru Tojo awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Shonan.
In Kanagawa, Keisuke Saka (Shonan) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa attack but Michael Olunga's header doesn't find the target.
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Free kick Kashiwa.
Bin Ukishima is making the team's first substitution at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka with Temma Matsuda replacing Akimi Barada.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Mitsuki Saito is replacing Satoshi Tanaka for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
Kashiwa drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 64, Shonan have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 66, Taiga Hata for Shonan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Tarik Elyounoussi (Shonan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Minoru Tojo blows against Kashiwa's Michael Olunga for offside.
In the minute 72, Shonan have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Kanagawa.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 74, Shonan pushes forward through Tarik Elyounoussi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Kashiwa's area.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Kashiwa.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 78, Shonan to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Temma Matsuda gets an equalizer for Shonan. The score is now 2-2.
Tarik Elyounoussi with an assist there.
Minoru Tojo signals a Shonan throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 79, The away team have replaced Ataru Esaka with Yusuke Kobayashi. This is the second substitution made today by Nelsinho Baptista.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 81, Goal! A Naoki Ishihara header gives Shonan a 3-2 lead in Kanagawa.
Takuya Okamoto with an assist there.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 83, Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Shonan have an attacking throw-in.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 85, Bin Ukishima (Shonan) is making a third substitution, with Yuto Iwasaki replacing Tarik Elyounoussi.
Bin Ukishima (Shonan) is making a fourth substitution, with Hiroshi Ibusuki replacing Naoki Ishihara.
In the minute 86, Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fumiya Unoki is replacing Hayato Nakama for Kashiwa at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 87, Kashiwa have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Shonan are in shooting range from this free kick.
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Kashiwa's area.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Cristiano (Kashiwa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Kashiwa.
Kashiwa have a dangerous throw-in.
Kashiwa's Cristiano gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Shonan defender.
In Kanagawa Kashiwa attack through Cristiano. The finish is off target, however.
Minoru Tojo awards Shonan a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 3-2.
Temma Matsuda (Shonan) has received a yellow card from Minoru Tojo.
Michael Olunga (Kashiwa) gets a yellow card.
The home team have replaced Taiga Hata with Hirokazu Ishihara. This is the fifth substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
